```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
```

Let's create a scatterplot with `ggplot2` and the iris dataset

## Explore the data

```{r}
iris_clean <- iris %>% 
  clean_names()

glimpse(iris_clean)
```

## Create a scatterplot

```{r}
ggplot(data = iris_clean, aes(x = sepal_length, y = sepal_width, color = species)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  scale_color_viridis_d() +
  labs(x = "Sepal length",
       y = "Sepal width",
       color = "Species") +
  theme_light(base_size = 12)
```
